bug.author: akihironitta
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h2>üêõ Bug</denchmark-h>
There are sometimes so many redundant lines in the tests output which makes it hard to review PRs: <denchmark-code>... tests/models/test_classic_ml.py::test_logistic_regression_model tests/models/test_classic_ml.py::test_logistic_regression_model tests/models/test_classic_ml.py::test_logistic_regression_model ... </denchmark-code>
This behaviour happens in <denchmark-link:https://github.com/PyTorchLightning/pytorch-lightning-bolts/pull/403/checks?check_run_id=1669189373>https://github.com/PyTorchLightning/pytorch-lightning-bolts/pull/403/checks?check_run_id=1669189373</denchmark-link>
while it doesn't in <denchmark-link:https://github.com/PyTorchLightning/pytorch-lightning-bolts/pull/475/checks?check_run_id=1669579907>https://github.com/PyTorchLightning/pytorch-lightning-bolts/pull/475/checks?check_run_id=1669579907</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-h:h3>To Reproduce</denchmark-h>
I'm still unsure when this happens. <denchmark-h:h3>Expected behaviour</denchmark-h>
Only one line output: <denchmark-code>tests/models/test_classic_ml.py::test_logistic_regression_model </denchmark-code>
<denchmark-h:h3>Environment</denchmark-h>
PyTorch Version (e.g., 1.0): OS (e.g., Linux): How you installed PyTorch (conda, pip, source): Build command you used (if compiling from source): Python version: CUDA/cuDNN version: GPU models and configuration: Any other relevant information:
<denchmark-h:h3>Additional context</denchmark-h>

comments.comment: It seems the latest commit <denchmark-link:https://github.com/PyTorchLightning/pytorch-lightning-bolts/commit/c997f8576ca6f520df940f8e93fb874a8b130ef7>c997f85</denchmark-link> on the master branch doesn't have this issue for unknown reasons...
I'll continue investigating this further in <denchmark-link:https://github.com/PyTorchLightning/pytorch-lightning-bolts/pull/506>#506</denchmark-link> .
